channel.title: Walking on a dream (Remix) made by me
channel.description:
I've been doing some producing/remixing for a couple years now and I think this may be the best one I've done --so far. Anyway, I'm gonna let you give it a listen and give me some feedback that I can use in my future if you can/want to.
The bass in the song may be a little bit overbearing...
https://soundcloud.com/cody-march/walking-on-a-dream-by-empire
Thanks, Bl3nd (Cody)

item.title: Walking on a dream (Remix) made by me

Not my style of music but this is radio quality stuff

Thanks man
